content: On the weekends, I enjoy a variety of activities. I am an avid shooter and hunter, so I often spend my weekends at the shooting range or out in the woods hunting. I also enjoy spending time with my friends and family, whether it's grilling out in the backyard or going to a local sports event. I also try to stay active and fit, so I often go hiking or biking in the local mountains. In short, I enjoy a mix of outdoor activities and spending time with loved ones on the weekends.
